command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute SHOW CREATE TABLE spc_analysis_history;
stdout:
Table	Create Table
spc_analysis_history	CREATE TABLE `spc_analysis_history` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `mappingId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `productCode` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `stationName` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `startDate` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `endDate` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `sampleCount` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `mean` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `stdDev` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `cp` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `cpk` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `ucl` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `lcl` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `usl` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `lsl` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `alertTriggered` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `llmAnalysis` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `analyzedBy` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `analyzed_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `production_line_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `violations` text DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `idx_spc_analysis_history_product_code` (`productCode`),
  KEY `idx_spc_analysis_history_station_name` (`stationName`),
  KEY `idx_spc_analysis_history_created_at` (`createdAt`),
  KEY `idx_spc_analysis_history_cpk` (`cpk`),
  KEY `idx_spc_analysis_product` (`productCode`),
  KEY `idx_spc_analysis_station` (`stationName`),
  KEY `idx_spc_analysis_date` (`createdAt`),
  KEY `idx_spc_analysis_mapping` (`mappingId`),
  KEY `` (`stationName`),
  KEY `idx_spc_analysis_history_mapping` (`mappingId`),
  KEY `idx_spc_analysis_history_composite` (`productCode`,`stationName`,`createdAt`),
  KEY `idx_spc_analysis_history_product` (`productCode`,`startDate`),
  KEY `idx_spc_analysis_history_dates` (`startDate`,`endDate`),
  KEY `idx_spc_history_mapping` (`mappingId`),
  KEY `idx_spc_history_created` (`createdAt`),
  KEY `idx_spc_history_mapping_created` (`mappingId`,`createdAt`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin AUTO_INCREMENT=210001
